title: Episode 290 - One Piece Wiki

author: One Piece Wiki contributors
notes: Comprehensive character information including full name, affiliations, abilities (Seimei Kikan techniques), Doriki power level (810), voice actors, personality, and background.

title: Tony Tony Chopper - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
notes: Character profile providing names, debut information, voice actors, devil fruit details, age, bounties, and affiliation with Straw Hat Pirates.

title: Seimei Kikan - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
notes: Detailed explanation of the Seimei Kikan (Life Return) technique, its mechanics, and specific applications by Kumadori including hair manipulation and weight control.

title: Hito Hito no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
notes: Comprehensive devil fruit information including type, abilities, Monster Point details, Rumble Ball mechanics, and the consequences of taking three Rumble Balls.

title: Rumble Ball - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
notes: Information about the Rumble Ball drug, its effects, and the dangerous consequences of taking three within six hours that trigger Monster Point.

title: Crazy Rainbow - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
notes: Information about Opening 8 'Crazy Rainbow' by Tackey & Tsubasa, used for episodes 284-325.

title: One Piece Episode 290 - IMDb
author: IMDb contributors and reviewers
notes: Episode rating (8.6) and user reviews providing fan reactions and analysis of the episode's quality, animation, and emotional impact.

author: Wikipedia contributors
notes: Used for episode list context and season information confirming Episode 290's placement in Season 9.
